Sharing my own view:Eventually this is Penny Stock channel and value investing concept may not be the best approach as it is more for long term investing and may not be as lucrative to riding waves for quick gains. However  do note that riding waves is high risk and the waves will disappear so do control your greed properly. Hit and run fast. small gain is better then losses.Lastly as our security officer Furion always say  remember to set your Stop Loss strategy and dun trade based on emo.All the best!!!
